events.name: ReportGenerated
events.description: Triggered when a new report is successfully created.

events.name: ReportSent
events.description: Occurs when a report is dispatched to stakeholders.

events.name: AnalyticsDataUpdated
events.description: Occurs when the underlying data for analytics is refreshed.

events.name: UserAccessedReport
events.description: Tracks when a user views or accesses a report.

commands.name: GenerateReport
commands.description: Triggered when a new report is successfully created.

commands.name: SendReport
commands.description: Occurs when a report is dispatched to stakeholders.

commands.name: UpdateAnalyticsData
commands.description: Occurs when the underlying data for analytics is refreshed.

commands.name: AccessReport
commands.description: Tracks when a user views or accesses a report.

integrationPoints.name: UserManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with user management to track report access.

integrationPoints.name: DataWarehouse
integrationPoints.description: Connect to the data warehouse for real-time analytics updates.

integrationPoints.name: EmailService
integrationPoints.description: Integration to send reports via email.

integrationPoints.name: DashboardService
integrationPoints.description: Integrate to update dashboards with new analytics data.
